description: The ideal candidate will have an ability to create and maintain an efficient system of operation to support the business needs. The candidate should be comfortable multitasking and working cross-functionally with different business units. The ideal candidate will have previous experience in related fields.  Key Responsibilities: Project Management: Oversee the execution of social media campaigns, creative projects, and marketing stunts; manage timelines, budgets, and resources. Team Coordination: Lead cross-functional teams, facilitate regular meetings, and mentor team members to ensure alignment and productivity. Process Improvement: Analyze and optimize workflows; implement and document standard operating procedures (SOPs). Client Relations: Serve as a point of contact for key clients; collaborate with the Creative Director and Brand Manager on proposals and client communications. Budget Management: Develop and manage the agency’s budget; monitor financial performance and report on variances. Vendor and Partner Management: Negotiate contracts and manage relationships with external vendors and partners. Reporting and Analytics: Develop reporting systems to track project performance, team productivity, and financial metrics; provide insights to senior management. Qualifications 3+ years of experience in a similar role Proficiency with Microsoft Office Strong organizational and communication skills Strong ability to multitask Comfort working with multiple groups within business
